fields.name: Licence to take fauna for scientific purposes
fields.statement: The undermentioned person may take fauna for research or other scientific purposes and where authorised, keep it in captivity, subject to the following and attached conditions, which may be added to, suspended or otherwise varied as considered fit.

children.label: Does this project require any other approvals, permits, licences, etc under any other state or federal legislation?
children.name: requires_permits

yes.label: Please provide detail and attach any applications made or permissions granted.
yes.name: permits

yes.label: I acknowledge that should other permissions/approvals be required it may affect the processing time for this Regulation 17 licence
yes.name: permits_acknowledgement

children.label: If activity has been (or is being) assessed by an Animal Ethics Committee (AEC) provide committee name.
children.name: aec_name

children.label: Attach a copy of the AEC project application and approval.
children.name: aec_application_and_approval

grant.label: Provide details of the grant or sponsorship, including name, address and contact details of the organisation funding the project
grant.name: grant_details

contract.label: Provide details of the Client, including name, address and contact details
contract.name: contract_details

other.label: Provide details of who is funding the project or how the project is being funded
other.name: financial_details_other

children.label: Provide relevant qualifications and/or experience details specific to this project
children.name: qualifications

children.label: I acknowledge that I am legally responsible for the actions of anyone involved in the take of fauna activities under this licence.
children.name: authorised_persons_acknowledgement

children.label: Provide relevant qualification / experience (relative to activity)
children.name: ap_qualification

children.label: If a list of authorised persons is not currently available, please explain:
children.name: ap_unavailable_explanation

children.label: I acknowledge that I will make changes in this system to authorised persons throughout licence duration if changes are required
children.name: ap_change_acknowledgement

children.label: Which of the following describes your project?
children.name: project

survey.label: How many locations will be surveyed?
survey.name: survey_num_survey_locations

survey.label: Are any locations on CALM Act land?
survey.name: survey_locations_calm_land

survey.label: Survey Details
survey.name: survey_survey_details
survey.help_text: If multiple survey locations; provide details separately for each location and add an additional location after the methods section for the first location.

children.label: If field dates are unknown, use anticipated field dates in the start and end date above and explain below.
children.name: survey_field_dates_unknown

children.label: Will your activity possibly interact with any threatened or priority fauna (including non-target species)?
children.name: survey_threatened_priority_fauna

children.label: Will your activities be in accordance with Parks and Wildlife standard operating procedures?
children.name: survey_standard_operating_procedures

children.label: Will your activities be in accordance with EPA Guidance Statements, Position Statements or Technical Reports?
children.name: survey_epa_statements

children.label: Will your activities be in accordance with any other SOPs, protocols, guidelines or manuals?
children.name: survey_sops

yes.label: Attach a copy of the relevent document(s)
yes.name: survey_sops_documents

children.label: What survey type will you be conducting?
children.name: survey_survey_type

on.name: survey_level_1_survey_method

research.label: Note: ‘Research’ as a licence project type should only be select if the proposed activity does not fit within the methodology for research or survey.
research.name: research_note_1

research.label: Monitoring should be selected if your study includes capture-mark-recapture or fauna tracking. Usually with field sessions at regular or irregular intervals, and total project duration greater than 12 months.
research.name: research_note_2

research.label: Survey should be selected if your study includes capture and release, for one or a few field sessions, and total project duration up to but not greater than 12 months.
research.name: research_note_3

research.label: Which of the following describes your research?
research.name: research_type
